website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an at-home waxing kit for targeted areas, this one is a good choice, but some competitors are more versatile.
pros: Specifically formulated for delicate areas with short and/or coarse hair, this hard wax is made with chlorophyll to protect and soothe
Heats and melts in as little as a minute
cons: As with similar microwavable kits, care must be taken to avoid messes and accidents
Wax also has a sticky feel on the skin

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like it at all. The only thing that I liked was that it didn’t smell awful. It only took %70 of my face Hair off and I had to use the whole bottle and a day later it left my face pealing and flaky. I followed the instructions to the tee and this is what happened. I wouldn’t recommend it at all
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fearnley

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well, I have sensitive skin and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well, I have sensitive skin and was afraid to use it on my face. In the past I have tried waxes that rip my skin off, this was not one of those. My skin felt very soft and smooth afterwards. Painless!
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, even with the small learning curve
customer_reviews.text: Been waxing for almost 20 years and got 2 laser treatments about a year ago. I wanted to try something that could remove those pesky hairs that were missed by laser, but not have to set an appointment and spend copious amounts of money to just remove some strays here and there. This product works awesome. It takes a little bit of practice, but you’ll get the hang of it. Very pleased with results and way less irritation and ingrown hairs than with strip waxing. Hard wax doesn’t stick to the skin or irritate is much.
customer_reviews.author: KKSY

customer_reviews.title: Good consistency and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, especially that it's not the normal wax. It does a really great job. The only reason I gave it the four stars instead of the five stars, I have found it hard to apply any facial hair removers with a popsicle stick. You have to lean over the container to keep it from dropping on your clothes, and also to get the wax and even coat on your skin. This was not hard to do that's why it still receives a four-star for me. I really like this product and intend on reordering again.
customer_reviews.author: ESMc

customer_reviews.title: Affordable all natural and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely surprised with how amazing this product it. I have hereditary extra dark facial/body hair and would normally need to get my full face threaded and it was expensive. I tried this and it was a third the cost, all natural, unbelievably easy to use, and really not painful in my opinion. I'm hypersensitive too, so that's saying something! It cleanly perfectly concisely waxed my sideburns, lip, and other areas of my face and did not irritate my skin. I can't believe I never tried this before! The only note is you'll want to pick up some coconut oil and extra popsicle sticks for application and cleanup. This product has saved me time money and insecurity stress.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but still falls short
customer_reviews.text: I think the idea with no strips to use the wax is great, but I still feel like this needs them. The wax hardens and you can peel it off, but I don't like how the edges of the wax sometimes leaves a residue and I'm left scratching it off with my nails. Also, it didn't work quite too well removing my hair on my upper lip and to let it grow as long as the recommended length to get the best results would be too long. Just think this needs to be modified.
customer_reviews.author: Wisteria818

customer_reviews.title: This wax does NOT come off in strips.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never ever written a negative review in my life and I really didn’t want to but I don’t want people wasting their money on this. I’ve been waxing myself for the past 10 years and this is by far the worst wax I’ve ever used. It does not come off as a strip but instead comes off tiny pieces at a time. Waxing doesn’t even bother me anymore but this hurt! I took a picture so you can see.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Strong

customer_reviews.title: Very small window to use properly
customer_reviews.text: The wax cools quickly, so you need a way to keep it warm while using it - maybe you can use a hot water bath. After you spread it on your hair, there's also a very tight window between too warm and stretchy and too cool and hard. If you don't time removal perfectly, then you will end up either just pulling at the hair with stretchy, sticky wax or ripping off smaller chunks of hardened wax instead of getting a strip in one go. The leftover hard wax on your body is tedious to remove and best done in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvi

customer_reviews.title: Works great on armpit hair
customer_reviews.text: This hard wax works great for coarse body hair. It does take a bit of time to finally get the wax heated up and to the right consistency, but if you apply it right (I suggest watching videos) it really does work! I mainly used it to wax my armpits (word to the wise, it hurts. BAD.) and it doesn't take all of the hair off but does what I thought it would. It doesn't work great on thin/fine hair, but I would recommend it for the coarse hair ladies or men like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient. Great price
customer_reviews.text: I've been going to a professional waxer for years for bikini and brazilian. Due to COVID I started to do some research about how to do this myself. This product was easy to use, effective and inexpensive. I was paying $50 + tip at the salon. The wax takes longer than the packaging indicates to warm up. You have to work fast or you need to reheat and then the consistency is more difficult to work with. One package was enough. It was as effective at hair removal as the salon wax. My first try and it was pretty easy and not any more painful. Great product. Just bought 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: elie sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Good Hard Wax
customer_reviews.text: This product is over all very good. The only thing I would say about this product is that it takes a long time for the hard wax to melt in the microwave. Once it's melted into a carmel texture, it adheres to the skin and easily removes moves the hair. This wax does a good job at removing short stuborn hair however it also drys/hardens very quickly. I honestly prefer this product over the Gigi Stripfree hard wax.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: This product is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The instructions say not to microwave it for more than 2 minutes but it took closer to 10 to get the wax to the point where i could stir it and then it cooled off SO QUICKLY. I was running back and forth to the microwave every two strips. I used the whole jar and was only able to get half my lip, one armpit and the pelvic area of my bikini. Not at all worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: It does what the description says it will do
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact there is a soothing agent in the wax. My skin felt smooth after removing the wax. The product did what the description said it would do, remove fine hair. As it says, there is no need for a strip to peel off the wax and it removed the hair where I placed the wax. I'll order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gish

customer_reviews.title: For best results, I used a thicker layer of wax ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to try this a few times to get it right. For best results, I used a thicker layer of wax and made sure not to let it dry too long (it will break apart if you do). I also moved to a cooler location, as my bathroom was too hot and I kept sweating. Once I had the application technique and the location figured out, it was easier to use. I would recommend this product for small areas like underarms.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.

customer_reviews.title: I have only used this product once so far, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product once so far, and I have to say that I am impressed. My skin is sensitive on a normal basis so I always skeptical about trying new products. I decided to try this product because it clearly states it is all natural. I have to say, after 1 use I am a believer. My skin was smooth and oh so, soft after use. I have only used it on my face thus far and had no break outs or issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Barber

customer_reviews.title: Read me
customer_reviews.text: Yes shipping picks up even short hair is like Beyoncé for a couple of days only problem I will have is that when you are spoiling it around the stick sometimes it becomes very wealthy luckily I’ve worked in a salon so I know how to deal with that but sometimes it’s a pain be careful around the eye area and less is more fast shippers
customer_reviews.author: julie Deuel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this product on her face. She hates having to go get waxed at a salon. I could not be happier. It took ever tiny hair off and with no pain. Also, no visible redness or bumps the next day (something that always happens when she goes to the salon). Thanks for a great product. Will be purchasing again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn T.

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the company is cruelty free. I think this is worth getting for face waxing. Easy to do eyebrows and lip, and really not that painful at all. It is messy, and you can get lil wax strings like you would get with a hot glue gun. I did try and do armpits, had my boyfriend help me. It only seemed to pull half the hair. So for more fine facial hair its good but armpits or anything else ...i wouldnt dare be so brave 😂
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use - Very Effective - Cost Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I normally go to European Wax Center; I prefer hard wax to wax strips as it tugs less and doesn't hurt to the same extent. I didn't know I had an issue with their hard wax, until I tried Body Honee! I cannot say enough good things about this product! I have very sensitive skin, and this wax is unscented and natural leaving me no redness or irritation after application. I can really tell the difference in quality. I have re-purchased the microwavable version 3 times now, and have finally decided to purchase a warmer and buy the 14oz tin! Run, don't walk to bring this product home! It is easy to use, very effective and cost efficient!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great wax!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to try waxing my brows and upper lip myself, that this wax would be too harsh but it’s not! Super easy to control, and remove. This has seriously saved me some money at the salon! Thanks all!
customer_reviews.author: Randi S.

customer_reviews.title: Small amount of wax.
customer_reviews.text: Only two sticks and the box came opened. have to use other sticks I had, small amount of wax for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pumbandad

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST WAX. I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: Love this wax. It is the only one l will buy from now on. I bought a wax warmer that came with soft purple wax beads so l thought I'd try it. Big mistake. It doesn't work and it was a mess. I just set my container of my hard wax kit and it heats up and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: I feel as if I wasted a lot of it
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, it's messy as hell if you're not very skilled in waxing. I feel as if I wasted a lot of it. I had to apply it 2-3 times to remove the hair. Mind you, it was my first time waxing my underarms by myself and it was the underarm area so the hair is coarser and grows in different directions. I would buy it again and it will probably be better with practice. Definitely prefer this over the strips. Every time I've used wax with muslin strips it destroys my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective  on short coarse hair
customer_reviews.text: This wax can be messy, but is effective -even on coarse, short facial hair. Not pain free, but if you're used to waxing, it's not an issue. It keeps me hair free for about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy68

customer_reviews.title: I hope that all wax isn’t this painful
customer_reviews.text: Reading through what some other people have posted here I’m glad that it’s not just me thinking I’m crazy. Certainly melts well in the microwave but does not spread well, nor does it come off well. It’s a very tedious and slow process, the hair comes out in clumps and I’d rate excruciating pain as a 9 on a 1-10 scale (and I’m generally not a wimp). I thought ok so maybe it’s just a sensitive area...spread it on my leg, the same horrible pain. Long story short, it doesn’t actually make a strip, and even if it did, pulling out more than ten hairs at once would require a preparatory morphine drip.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Heydon

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, just take a Tylenol before hand. For my first time it did fine, instructions helped.
customer_reviews.author: frshop

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Hard to use and super hard to get off. Seriously killed my upper lip.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Changed recipe/formula
customer_reviews.text: They changed the recipe between the first and second time I ordered it. The first one was great and worked really well, but when I ordered again a few months later it came in a different jar and was a different tone of green. When I tried to use it it didn't dry as nicely and even after 30 seconds was still too sticky to pull off. Plus it left a lot of excess wax that I needed to pick off.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Be patient
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard product to get used to. Still working on it
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but work fast
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use, but very messy and completely unusable after 15 minutes. Not too bad removing hair

customer_reviews.title: It is the best Hard wax to purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I expected to Be! It is the best Hard wax to purchase. The way the wax works is you place an amount depending on the hair growth, let it cool down and pull. I provided a picture of a males leg hair which I thought would be the type of hair to try out this was. It took out the wax patch we covered leaving the skin EXTREMELY soft. I am extremely satisfied. This product is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Just Like It Says!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well. I followed the directions to remove some peach fuzz on my face and I was totally satisfied with the results. A side benefit was that when used as directed, the wax also exfoliates the skin when you remove it (a little uncomfortable but worth it).
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Just shattered into pieces when trying to remove
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. To pull it off it just shattered like glass and made a mess everywhere. I have done waxing for many years. Definitely not ordering this one again.
customer_reviews.author: K-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have unwanted facial hair
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my face and it works really well. I am on my 3rd pack, don't think I will be looking for another face wax. Haven't used it on any other area so can't comment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not remove fine facial hair and is really messy
customer_reviews.text: I have fine facial hair and It did not work at all. Do not buy unless you have really long hair or thick hair so the wax can grab on to better.
customer_reviews.author: paulette peros

customer_reviews.title: !! BEWARE AND REALLY NAUSEATING !!
customer_reviews.text: DISGUSTING!! Opened the box and popped it in the microwave and saw a hair follicle embedded inside the wax!! Seriously disgusted!
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Clean line, easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Much easier and less messy than the other waxes, which stick to everything forever! Only thing is, if you make a mistake, there is no getting it off without the hair. The other wax, you can pour baby oil on and rescue if you spread it too far. But this is much more precise to begin with. Give a cleaner edge, too. But my favorite part is the easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: D. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not so bad for the cost
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend used this wax for her bikini line. Her review was: "The wax didn't heat up to a smooth consistency without getting extremely hot. It worked somewhat well to remove hair, but definitely did not get all of it. There were only two post-depilatory sheets in the pack, when four would be a more appropriate number for waxing a small area like bikini or underarms. It wasn't great, but compared to the cost of professional waxing it's alright."
customer_reviews.author: Goody

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my bikini line. It doesn't work. I've tried going over the same spots several times. It could only pull a few hairs at a time.
customer_reviews.author: lacyanna leong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! But melt it less for quicker dry time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this twice now. Love it. I recommend anyone to not melt it all the way. When it’s completely melted it’s too hot and takes like ne’er to dry hard. Instead- when you mic it for less time and it’s thicker and not all melted, I’ve found that’s the perfect time to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Ken Ken

customer_reviews.title: Although I've waxed at home before, I've never used ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I've waxed at home before, I've never used "hard" wax. I used this for my underarms and bikini and was pleasantly surprised. It didn't get many bikini hairs, but those are much shorter than 1/4 inch. It got all my armpit hairs, though! And I've never waxed that before. My advice, read the directions thoroughly. The advice of creating a tab and pulling before the wax hardens is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: It has to be the perfect temperature to actually work correctly
customer_reviews.text: This wax is tricky. It has to be the perfect temperature to actually work. If its too warm, you will have to wait with it on until its completely hard. If you pull off tacky wax, it will not pull anything. To get the best results, do not melt the entire container. As soon as it starts to melt, take it out and use it. You'll have to re-heat frequently (like every 2 dips), but it beats having tacky wax sit on your body/face for 10 minutes until it hardens.
customer_reviews.author: Nic B

customer_reviews.title: Not effective at all
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to try this kit. DID NOT WORK. The hair I had when I first applied the wax, was the hair that was there when I pulled it off. Did not work at all, do not buy if you're looking for results.
customer_reviews.author: MissTenn423

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware...not getting what you think your purchasing...
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. I have used hard wax in the past with great results, but this stuff doesn't work. So, when I used this product once applied it was either too brittle or too soft to remove effectively. I have never had hard wax behave like this before so my warning to the next person looking for a hard wax product, stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Great wax
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and wax always leaves my skin irritated. This wax did not, I did get welts on my bikini line, but they only lasted about an hour. The next day I didn't have any irritation or redness at all. It didn't get all of the hair, but most of it . I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay1881

customer_reviews.title: works ... a little bit
customer_reviews.text: it does remove ur hair pretty quickly BUT it's messy and it only gets a MAJORITY of ur hair like.. im trying to be a spotless guinea pig here! i dont like this, i'd probably only use it as a backup if my other wax ran out. i much prefer the ones with strips because it's less messy and gets rid of everything in one go
customer_reviews.author: Robert Xie

customer_reviews.title: Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I’m super picky about products that I buy and always make sure it’s what I’m looking for. I wanted a container of microwaveable wax that I could throw on my vanity. Pretty annoyed that it shows a jar with a lid in photos but the “jar” you get is just a plastic dish with no lid. Not sanitary and super misleading. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tori C

customer_reviews.title: New formula is not good
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I believe they changed the formula. The packaging changes too. The new one takes twice as much time to heat up, break very easy when hardened, doesn’t adhere to the hair as much as before. I won’t be ordering again. I’ve been such a big fan of you and was having no problems with the jar before that I bought a week prior.
customer_reviews.author: ada y.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and It works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product several times and will continue to purchase it. It works! Let the wax cool a bit so you don’t burn yourself, then apply. Wait a minute then pull. The more you use it the longer you remain free of hair and the less it hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Miller

customer_reviews.title: Hair regrowth was faster using hard wax and when it came to eyebrows it would be too easy to make an unfixable mistake
customer_reviews.text: I used this on facial hair and while it's simple to use, relatively painless and not too messy I find the wax and linen method more effect. Hair regrowth was faster using hard wax and when it came to eyebrows it would be too easy to make an unfixable mistake. At least with wax and linen if you accidentally wax over brow area you don't want to remove you just choose not to place linen over that area and remove only the hair you choose. With hard wax you're committed.
customer_reviews.author: MyMind

customer_reviews.title: I don't have a lot of experience with waxing but it did the job great and was fairly easy to get the hang of
customer_reviews.text: Despite some reviews, I found the wax to work very well. I don't have a lot of experience with waxing but it did the job great and was fairly easy to get the hang of. I will say the first time I tried it ended in a big mess because I didn't let the wax cool enough before applying. However, the second time around was perfect. My only two cents is make sure you have some type of wax remover afterwards, but that has nothing to do with the quality or performance of the product.
customer_reviews.author: EEL

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Distributed evenly and pulled out coarse hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Distributed evenly and pulled out coarse hair with minimal discomfort. I have sensitive skin but I did NOT have an adverse reaction. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JaneDoe

customer_reviews.title: It works if you know what you're doing
customer_reviews.text: If you're totally clueless about waxing I would not recommend this as a first time product. Waxing for the first time yourself is entirely too painful. If you've been getting waxes done and want a break for your wallet this might be a solution because the hair won't be as thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: User-friendly at-home waxing
customer_reviews.text: This product is phenomenal! I researched a lot of waxing kits and settled on this one. As long as you pay attention to the directions provided you can't go wrong. I used the hard wax for my under arms and my upper lip. I have sensitive skin and this did not cause any irritation. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: C. Supplee

customer_reviews.title: Practice Should make Perfect

It was difficult to create the ridge needed to pull off the wax so it came off in pieces but still got the job done. I did have some bleeding, but not bad. I wish they included more wooden applicators because they are not re-useable.

customer_reviews.title: Hair removal at home made possible
customer_reviews.text: Direction very helpful and it worked. I would suggest putting a paper plate under it when applying, as it is drippy.

customer_reviews.author: Rachel z3z

After a couple times I am getting better at doing this myself and saving about $80/month by not going to the spa or salon for this service. I also prefer the microwaveable packaging so I just throw it all away when I’m done and no need to deal with a messy warmer full of (and covered in) wax!

customer_reviews.author: B.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Don't forget the numbing creme and popsicle sticks!

Microwaving it does the job don't need an expensive wax heater. 10/10 will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Underarm Hard Wax
customer_reviews.text: Waxing is not the funnest, but I will say that after going to a professional to wax was costly and maybe not worth my 50-plus dollars. I used this on my underarms and removed most of my hair in one go. Make sure you let the wax cool down enough before applying to your skin (duh) and apply a generous amount to your area that you are waxing. No issues with my underarms after a day, I do wish it came with more spatulas for better application when you are applying more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy and not super painful
customer_reviews.text: BodyHonee is my new go to for waxing at home. I used the wax for my underarms. It was easy and not super painful, especially once you get the hang of it. The wax doesn't stay hot for too long, so constantly having to run to the microwave was a bit annoying, but definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked exactly as I'd hoped and removed coarse, tough to remove hair that was just under 1/4". It did take a Weirdly long time to heat up in the microwave, about 8-10 minutes total which is way longer than the 3 minutes listed in the directions. It had a pleasant smell, didn't leave a residue, and wasn't harsh on my skin. Will be buying more.
